import React from 'react' import { userLogin } from '../reducers/userReducer' const LoginForm = () => { const handleLogin = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const username = e.target.value.username const password = e.target.value.password const userLogin = { username, password } userLogin(userLogin) e.target.value.username = '' e.target.value.password = '' } return(

Login to the application TEST

) } export default LoginForm
